text: "Sweet Love" is a 1986 song by Anita Baker. It is from her second studio album Rapture. It went to number 8 in the United States, number 10 in Ireland, number 13 in the United Kingdom and number 21 in Canada. It won 2 Grammy Awards in 1987. ==Track listings== 7" single # "Sweet Love" – 4:26 # "Watch Your Step" – 4:56 Limited edition gatefold - 7" single 7" single 1: # "Sweet Love" – 4:26 # "No One in the World" – 4:10 7" single 2: # "Same Ole Love (365 Days a Year)" (Live) – 4:01 # "You Bring Me Joy" (Live) – 4:31 7" single # "Sweet Love" – 4:26 # "No One in the World" – 4:10 == References == Category:1986 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Soul ballads Category:Anita Baker songs Category:Grammy Award-winning songs
title: Sweet Love (Anita Baker song)
